skillTree.localised_description: There are some deals that it would be extremely unwise to renege on…
The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Treason is never straightforward, especially when your every move is watched and reported.

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords have a chance to gain 2 loyalty
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Even the merest scratch caused by a blade edged with Manbane causes death.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: This poison contains a powerful narcotic that drives its victims to delusional insanity.
So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
This one doesn't just move in the shadows, they *are* the shadows…
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: You have to get up very early if you want to beat this one; nothing escapes their keen eye and lightning reflexes.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.

skillTree.localised_name: In the Corner of Your Eye
skillTree.localised_description: A shadow, shape, or image, barely perceived, dogs your steps and haunts your mind.
Those who live in shadow know how to avoid being seen.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 2% for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 4% for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 8% for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: No contract is beyond my skill.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +2 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Surviving in the harsh wilderness of Naggaroth is no easy task.

effects.description:
Armour: +2 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +4 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +8 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Anyone could be an assassin in disguise, on their way to fulfilling their latest contract.

effects.description:
Character's aura leadership effect: -3
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +10%
	(When this Hero is not embedded)

skillTree.localised_description: Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: Take it all!
Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.
Always watching.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(own characters in region)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Civilisation requires slaves. It is upon their toil that the future depends.

effects.description: Enlist Slaves action: Slaves generated per turn are increased by an additional 5
Enlist Slaves action: Slaves generated per turn are increased by an additional 10
Enlist Slaves action: Slaves generated per turn are increased by an additional 15

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.
Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.
When this one is abroad you can be sure that malice is borne towards anyone and everyone.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

Construction cost: -25% for Cult of Khaine or Cult of Pleasure buildings
	(local region)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Death Hags
	(own local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(own armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Trained from infancy to be masters of murder, these chosen killers are often employed by dreadlords to ensure loyalty amongst their ranks.

related_attributes.bullet_text: If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Trained from infancy to be masters of murder, these chosen killers are often employed by dreadlords to ensure loyalty amongst their ranks.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit remains hidden while firing.
